subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
Information and Knowledge Management Capacity Enhancement in East Sudan and the Transitional Areas: Specifically this component focuses on a supported hand‐over of the CRMA cycle for strategic planning purposes to state government counterparts.

CRMA in Darfur: Roll‐out of a full CRMA cycle across the region with concurrent capacity development efforts on information and knowledge management for key state government counterparts
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: CRMA
